column41: Costs relating to allowances and performance are recorded under the same category as salary, so figures cannot be separated from standard salary payments. Consultancy costs for April - June cannot be accurately attributed to individual months, so the total figure for this period has been equally split against each month.

The RAF Museum is devolved and does not operate the MOD/civil service grading structure.
